```{r Data Import}
wildschwein_BE <- read_delim("wildschwein_BE_2056.csv",",")

wildschwein_BE <- st_as_sf(wildschwein_BE, coords = c("E", "N"), crs = 2056, remove = FALSE)
wildschwein_BE
```


```{r Task 1: Getting an overview}
# Creating new column showing the timelag between two entries in int seconds
wildschwein_BE$timelag  <- as.integer(difftime(lead(wildschwein_BE$DatetimeUTC), wildschwein_BE$DatetimeUTC, units = "secs"))

wildschwein_BE
```
